select dm.daily_mntr_cd , bb.area_cd , bb.area_nm , bb.bldg_nm , dm.bldg_cd , bb.dtl_addr , bb.client_nm , to_char(dm.on_work_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as on_work_dt , to_char(dm.off_work_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as off_work_dt , dm.officer_nm , dm.site_mntr_url , to_char(dm.visit_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as visit_dt , dm.garbg_cnt , dm.food_chip_cnt , dm.memo , to_char(dm.cret_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as cret_dt , dm.cret_id , to_char(dm.updt_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as updt_dt , dm.updt_id from web.daily_mntr dm left join web.bldg_bas bb on dm.bldg_cd = bb.bldg_cd where 1=1
AND
bb.area_nm LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%'
bb.client_nm LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%'
bb.bldg_nm LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%'
dm.officer_nm LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%'
bb.area_nm LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%' or bb.client_nm LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%' or bb.bldg_nm LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%' or dm.officer_nm LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%'
and (dm.on_work_dt is not null or dm.off_work_dt is not null)
and dm.site_mntr_url is not null
and dm.cret_dt between #{fromDate}::timestamp and #{toDate}::timestamp
order by dm.daily_mntr_cd

select dm.daily_mntr_cd , bb.area_cd , bb.area_nm , bb.bldg_nm , dm.bldg_cd , bb.dtl_addr , bb.client_nm , to_char(dm.on_work_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as on_work_dt , to_char(dm.off_work_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as off_work_dt , dm.officer_nm , dm.site_mntr_url , to_char(dm.visit_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as visit_dt , dm.garbg_cnt , dm.food_chip_cnt , dm.memo , to_char(dm.cret_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as cret_dt , dm.cret_id , to_char(dm.updt_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as updt_dt , dm.updt_id from web.daily_mntr dm left join web.bldg_bas bb on dm.bldg_cd = bb.bldg_cd where 1=1 and dm.daily_mntr_cd = #{dailyMntrCd}
